title: Nang nen chuan
lyrics:
Nang nen chuan khawi hmunah pawh,
Nang nen chuan engtiang pawhin;
Hrehawmah pawh, rethei pawhin,
Nang nen chuan vanram a chang thin.

I hnena awm turin keimah hi min siam a,
I hnena awm turin vak bo lo turin;
I tel lo chuan engmah hian mi ti tlai thei lo e,
Ka famkimna, aw, nang chauh hi i ni.

Nang nen chuan khawi hmunah pawh,
Nang nen chuan tlakchham a awm lo;
Nun khawhara thian nei lo in mal in awm mah ila ,
Nang nen chuan vanram a chang thin.

Aw Isu, i hnenah chauh ka thla a muang, a hahchawl thin,
I tel lo a lawmna tur zawng ruai hmu si lo in;
I tel lo a tlei thei lo min siam i chennan chauh,
I tel lo chuan ka nun a kim thei lo,
Mahse, nang nen chuan vanram a chang thin.
